Bernie Sanders suggested the bigger battle would likely occur in Vermont.`` There is no question in my mind the Vermont Legislature is going to see an assault from the insurance industry,'' he said. There will be enormous pressure on the governor and Legislature not to go forward. James Haslam , director of the Vermont Workers Center which coordinated the Health Care is a Human Right Campaign, welcomed the political partnership on display Tuesday as more evidence of the increasing momentum for health care reform.

You know we went from the East Coast to the Kanye West Coast of the United States of America http://wn.com/Laurie_Oakes_Honorary_Doctorate_Acceptance_Speech_JSchool_2010 Canberra press gallery mainstay and Channel 9 political editor Laurie Oakes received an honorary doctorate from Brisbane's Jschool at the college's graduation ceremony last week.`` I'm not much into gongs and awards usually, but this recognition from a journalism college that's fast making a mark is something I do value, he said.`` I had virtually no training going into journalism apart from a pretty useless arts degree, so it's nice to have some acknowledgement I've learnt something on the way through.''
